adjectives.description: ikey (comparative more ikey, superlative most ikey)

entries.meaning: (slang, derogatory) Having negative traits stereotypically associated with Jews; cunning, supercilious.

examples: My son, if you go to the races to battle with Ikey and Mo,
Remember, it's seldom the pigeon can pick out the eye of the crow;
